name: Fetch Dog Image URL

on:
  schedule:
    # Runs at the beginning of every hour
    - cron: '0 * * * *'

jobs:
  fetch-dog-data:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v2

    - name: Fetch Dog Image URL
      run: |
        curl -s https://dog.ceo/api/breeds/image/random > dogs.txt
    
    - name: Commit and push if there's a change
      run: |
        git config --global user.email "action@github.com"
        git config --global user.name "GitHub Action"
        git add dogs.txt
        git commit -m "Update dog image URL" -a || echo "No changes to commit"
        git push
